<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BT&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockFrequencyInfoImpl&lt;BT&gt;::applyIterativeInference() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract blocks for processing: a block is considered for inference iff it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can be reached from the entry by edges with a positive probability.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Non-processed blocks are assigned with the zero frequency and are ignored</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the computation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt; ReachableBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><Highlight kind="normal">  findReachableBlocks(ReachableBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ReachableBlocks.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The map is used to index successors/predecessors of reachable blocks in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the ReachableBlocks vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const BlockT &#42;, size&#95;t&gt;</a> BlockIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract initial frequencies for the reachable blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Freq = std::vector&lt;Scaled64&gt;(ReachableBlocks.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> SumFreq;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; ReachableBlocks.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockT &#42;BB = ReachableBlocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><Highlight kind="normal">    BlockIndex&#91;BB&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><Highlight kind="normal">    Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = getFloatingBlockFreq(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><Highlight kind="normal">    SumFreq += Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!SumFreq.isZero() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;empty initial block frequencies&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Applying iterative inference for &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getName()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; with &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; ReachableBlocks.size() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; blocks\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Normalizing frequencies so they sum up to 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> : Freq) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> /= SumFreq;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Setting up edge probabilities using sparse matrix representation:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ProbMatrix&#91;I&#93; holds a vector of pairs (J, P) where Pr&#91;J -&gt; I | J&#93; = P</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><Highlight kind="normal">  ProbMatrixType ProbMatrix;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><Highlight kind="normal">  initTransitionProbabilities(ReachableBlocks, BlockIndex, ProbMatrix);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Run the propagation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><Highlight kind="normal">  iterativeInference(ProbMatrix, Freq);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assign computed frequency values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockT &amp;BB : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/utils/amdgpudelayedmcexpr-cpp/#a3b9e43a5529fa7d4adb2bad70198c9bd">getNode</a>(&amp;BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.isValid())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = BlockIndex.find(&amp;BB); It != BlockIndex.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><Highlight kind="normal">      Freqs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index&#93;.Scaled = Freq&#91;It-&gt;second&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><Highlight kind="normal">      Freqs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index&#93;.Scaled = Scaled64::getZero();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockFrequencyInfoImpl&lt;BT&gt;::iterativeInference(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ProbMatrixType &amp;ProbMatrix, std::vector&lt;Scaled64&gt; &amp;Freq)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(0.0 &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af3084cda6b41d1d8a16461200aef67c8">IterativeBFIPrecision</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af3084cda6b41d1d8a16461200aef67c8">IterativeBFIPrecision</a> &lt; 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrectly specified precision&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Convert double precision to Scaled64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Precision =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">      Scaled64::getInverse(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint64&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(1.0 / <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af3084cda6b41d1d8a16461200aef67c8">IterativeBFIPrecision</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxIterations = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a582551f1360cc4086c959f93624db34c">IterativeBFIMaxIterationsPerBlock</a> &#42; Freq.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;  Initial discrepancy = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; discrepancy(ProbMatrix, Freq).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba83a013c55b19255697393a10d9165e">toString</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Successors&#91;I&#93; holds unique sucessors of the I-th block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Successors = std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;size&#95;t&gt;&gt;(Freq.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Freq.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Jump : ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="normal">      Successors&#91;Jump.first&#93;.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To speedup computation, we maintain a set of &quot;active&quot; blocks whose</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// frequencies need to be updated based on the incoming edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The set is dynamic and changes after every update. Initially all blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with a positive frequency are active</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsActive = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a>(Freq.size(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::queue&lt;size&#95;t&gt; ActiveSet;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Freq.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">      ActiveSet.push(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">      IsActive&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate over the blocks propagating frequencies</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It++ &lt; MaxIterations &amp;&amp; !ActiveSet.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = ActiveSet.front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal">    ActiveSet.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="normal">    IsActive&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute a new frequency for the block: NewFreq := Freq \\times ProbMatrix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A special care is taken for self-edges that needs to be scaled by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (1.0 - SelfProb), where SelfProb is the sum of probabilities on the edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> NewFreq;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> OneMinusSelfProb = Scaled64::getOne();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Jump : ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump.first == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">        OneMinusSelfProb -= Jump.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">        NewFreq += Freq&#91;Jump.first&#93; &#42; Jump.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OneMinusSelfProb != Scaled64::getOne())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewFreq /= OneMinusSelfProb;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the block&#39;s frequency has changed enough, then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// make sure the block and its successors are in the active set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Change = Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &gt;= NewFreq ? Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; - NewFreq : NewFreq - Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Change &gt; Precision) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><Highlight kind="normal">      ActiveSet.push(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><Highlight kind="normal">      IsActive&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockFrequencyInfoImpl&lt;BT&gt;::initTransitionProbabilities(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Src = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> &lt; NumBlocks; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const BlockT &#42;, 2&gt;</a> UniqueSuccs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acc2e6a2001a5f102f18060a53520e82b">children&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(BB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore cold blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BlockIndex.contains(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore parallel edges between BB and SI blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!UniqueSuccs.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>).second)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EP = BPI-&gt;getEdgeProbability(BB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EP.isZero())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EdgeProb =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><Highlight kind="normal">          Scaled64::getFraction(EP.getNumerator(), EP.getDenominator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = BlockIndex.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>)-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><Highlight kind="normal">      Succs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(Dst, EdgeProb));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><Highlight kind="normal">      SumProb&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93; += EdgeProb;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add transitions for every jump with positive branch probability</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><Highlight kind="normal">  ProbMatrix = ProbMatrixType(NumBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Src = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> &lt; NumBlocks; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore blocks w/o successors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Succs&#91;Src&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a0e9cf49b789ff0825ffea99d23afd013">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!SumProb&#91;Src&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lint-cpp/#a45005634b54e2126cb3e6ec0dbc9ade4">isZero</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Zero sum probability of non-exit block&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Jump : Succs&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> Prob = Jump.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(Src, Prob / SumProb&#91;Src&#93;));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add transitions from sinks to the source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EntryIdx = BlockIndex.find(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;front())-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Src = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> &lt; NumBlocks; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Succs&#91;Src&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a0e9cf49b789ff0825ffea99d23afd013">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbMatrix&#91;EntryIdx&#93;.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(Src, Scaled64::getOne()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a5514a17c0ec3ccae841930a4f8f74f99">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase::Scaled64</a> BlockFrequencyInfoImpl&lt;BT&gt;::discrepancy(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ProbMatrixType &amp;ProbMatrix, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;Scaled64&gt; &amp;Freq)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Freq&#91;0&#93; &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Incorrectly computed frequency of the entry block&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> Discrepancy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; ProbMatrix.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> Sum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Jump : ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sum += Freq&#91;Jump.first&#93; &#42; Jump.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="normal">    Discrepancy += Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &gt;= Sum ? Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; - Sum : Sum - Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Normalizing by the frequency of the entry block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Discrepancy / Freq&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
